meanings.sent1: The worksheet is printable, so you can easily make a copy.
meanings.sent2: The printable coloring pages are perfect for kids.
meanings.sent3: I found a printable recipe online, but it printed out in a funny font.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a printable picture, clear and easy to see.
meanings.sent5: The instructions were so clear, they were practically printable in my mind.

meanings.sent1: The paper quality is printable, making it great for flyers.
meanings.sent2: The printable invitations turned out beautifully.
meanings.sent3: He wore a printable shirt with a quirky design to the party.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a printable message, easy to understand and share.
meanings.sent5: The map was so detailed, it was practically printable in its accuracy.

meanings.definition: Able to be reproduced by printing.
meanings.sent1: The logo is printable on various materials for branding.
meanings.sent2: The printable labels make organizing a breeze.
meanings.sent3: She had a printable copy of the contract ready for signing.
meanings.sent4: His memory was like a printable document, easily retrievable.
meanings.sent5: The information was so clear, it was practically printable in its clarity.

meanings.definition: A document or image that can be printed.
meanings.sent1: I need a printable of the schedule for the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The teacher handed out printables for the class activity.
meanings.sent3: He always carries a few printables in his bag for reference.
meanings.sent4: The map was like a printable guide, leading us through the city.
meanings.sent5: The recipe was so easy to follow, it was practically a printable in itself.
